fields.label: Release Date
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'Release Date' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: Discontinued
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'Discontinued' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: SKU / Part #
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'SKU / Part #' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: Price (MSRP)
fields.tooltip_md: MSRP price bracket or stated MSRP. Keep as a string token; do not guess if not public.

fields.label: Colors
fields.tooltip_md: Colorway tokens. Use list<string>. Normalize grey→gray; multi-colorways may use '+'.

fields.label: Design
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'Design' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: Lighting
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'Lighting' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: RGB
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'RGB' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: Connection
fields.tooltip_md: Primary connection mode (wired/wireless/hybrid/bluetooth). Prefer manufacturer docs.

fields.label: Connectivity
fields.tooltip_md: Connectivity options (e.g., 2.4GHz, Bluetooth, USB). Use list if multiple.

fields.label: Computer-side Connector
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'Computer-side Connector' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: Mouse-side Connector
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'Mouse-side Connector' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: Bluetooth
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'Bluetooth' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: Cable Type
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'Cable Type' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: Paracord
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'Paracord' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: Wireless Charging
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'Wireless Charging' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: Battery Life (Hours)
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'Battery Life (Hours)' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: Adjustable Weight
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'Adjustable Weight' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: Feet Material
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'Feet Material' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: Coating
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'Coating' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: Honeycomb Frame
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'Honeycomb Frame' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: Silent Clicks
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'Silent Clicks' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: Weight
fields.tooltip_md: Mouse weight in grams. Convert oz→g when necessary; keep decimals if provided.

fields.label: Material
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'Material' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: Length
fields.tooltip_md: Overall length in millimeters. Convert inches/cm to mm; require unit when parsing.

fields.label: Width
fields.tooltip_md: Overall width in millimeters. Convert inches/cm to mm; require unit when parsing.

fields.label: Height
fields.tooltip_md: Overall height in millimeters. Convert inches/cm to mm; require unit when parsing.

fields.label: Form Factor
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'Form Factor' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: Shape
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'Shape' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: Hump
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'Hump' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: Front Flare
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'Front Flare' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: Thumb Rest
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'Thumb Rest' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: Grip
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'Grip' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: Hand Size
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'Hand Size' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: MCU
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'MCU' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: MCU Link
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'MCU Link' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: Sensor
fields.tooltip_md: Sensor model (component DB-backed). Must be evidence-backed; avoid wrong-variant merges.

fields.label: Sensor Brand
fields.tooltip_md: Sensor manufacturer brand (e.g., PixArt). Prefer component DB if sensor identified.

fields.label: Sensor Date
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'Sensor Date' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: Sensor Link
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'Sensor Link' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: Sensor Type
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'Sensor Type' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: Flawless Sensor
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'Flawless Sensor' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: Sensor Latency
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'Sensor Latency' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: Sensor Latency (By Mode)
fields.tooltip_md: Latency values by mode (wired/wireless/bluetooth) when available. Rare; do not guess. Structured list preferred: e.g., '1.1 wired, 1.3 wireless'.

fields.label: DPI Shift Latency
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'DPI Shift Latency' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: Polling Rate
fields.tooltip_md: Polling rate options in Hz. Normalize to list of integers, sorted ascending; common values: 125/250/500/1000/2000/4000/8000.

fields.label: Max DPI
fields.tooltip_md: Max DPI (or max CPI) as integer. Do not list steps; store maximum unless field_rules later adds a steps field.

fields.label: Max IPS
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'Max IPS' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: Max Acceleration
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'Max Acceleration' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: Lift-off Distance (LOD)
fields.tooltip_md: Lift-off distance (LOD) in mm. May be a range or set; normalize ranges to {min,max}.

fields.label: Lift Settings
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'Lift Settings' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: Motion Sync
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'Motion Sync' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: Hardware Acceleration
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'Hardware Acceleration' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: Smoothing
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'Smoothing' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: NVIDIA Reflex
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'NVIDIA Reflex' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: Switch
fields.tooltip_md: Main click switch model (component DB-backed). Evidence required.

fields.label: Switch Brand
fields.tooltip_md: Switch manufacturer brand. Prefer component DB when switch identified.

fields.label: Switch Type
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'Switch Type' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: Hot Swappable
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'Hot Swappable' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: Debounce
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'Debounce' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: Click Latency
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'Click Latency' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: Click Latency (By Mode)
fields.tooltip_md: Click latency values by mode when available. Rare; do not guess. Structured list preferred: e.g., '1.1 wired, 1.3 wireless'.

fields.label: Click Force
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'Click Force' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: Encoder
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'Encoder' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: Encoder Brand
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'Encoder Brand' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: Encoder Link
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'Encoder Link' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: Side Buttons
fields.tooltip_md: Count of side buttons (excluding main clicks and wheel).

fields.label: Middle Buttons
fields.tooltip_md: Count of middle buttons (wheel click + extra middle buttons).

fields.label: Programmable Buttons
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'Programmable Buttons' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: Tilt Scroll Wheel
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'Tilt Scroll Wheel' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.tooltip_md: Define 'Adjustable Scroll Wheel' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.tooltip_md: Define 'Onboard Memory' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.label: Onboard Memory (Value)
fields.tooltip_md: Define 'Onboard Memory (Value)' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.

fields.tooltip_md: Define 'Profile Switching' according to contract. If not provable with evidence, output 'unk' with unknown_reason.
